00029 #ifndef _MEAS_H_
00030 #define _MEAS_H_
00031 
00032 #include "in1out.h"
00033 
00034 //tolua_begin
00035 class   meas:   public  in1out {
00036   typedef       in1out  baseclass;
00037   
00038  public:        
00039   meas();
00040   ~meas();
00041   rec_typ       REC(data *, int);       // REC is a macro normally expanding to rec (for debugging)
00042   int   export(exp_typ *);
00043   int getDist(int idx) {return this->dist[idx];}
00044   void resDist(void){
00045     int i;
00046     greater_cnt = 0;
00047     for (i=0; i < maxtim; i++) dist[i] = 0;
00048   }
00049   int act(void){
00050     int i;
00051     if (vci != NILVCI)
00052       inp_type = CellType;
00053     else
00054       inp_type = DataType;
00055     CHECK(dist = new unsigned int[maxtim]);
00056     for (i = 0; i < maxtim; ++i)
00057       dist[i] = 0;
00058     return 0;
00059   }
00060   dat_typ       inp_type;               // type of input data
00061   
00062   int           maxtim;         /* max. cell transfer time */
00063   unsigned      greater_cnt;    /* counter for not registered times */
00064   //tolua_end
00065   unsigned      *dist;          /* CTDs */
00066 }; //tolua_export
00067 
00068 
00069 #endif  // _MEAS_H_
